meanings.definition: Treat (rubber) with sulfur at a high temperature to improve its strength and elasticity.
meanings.sent1: The factory volcanizes the rubber to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: Rubber volcanizes when exposed to high heat and sulfur.
meanings.sent3: The rubber tire volcanized itself in the scorching sun!
meanings.sent4: Her determination volcanizes her spirit, making her unstoppable.
meanings.sent5: The volcanic eruption of creativity volcanizes his mind, leading to brilliant ideas.

meanings.definition: Undergo a process in which rubber is treated with sulfur at a high temperature to improve its strength and elasticity.
meanings.sent1: Rubber volcanizes during the manufacturing process.
meanings.sent2: The rubber material volcanizes easily under the right conditions.
meanings.sent3: The rubber band volcanizes itself in the hot summer car.
meanings.sent4: His passion volcanizes his actions, propelling him forward.
meanings.sent5: The excitement volcanizes through the crowd, creating a lively atmosphere.
